item.description:
A Natives Exclusive!

Football at Fenway with Tom Brady as host!

Please read the following information carefully!

Your Natives are happy to announce that our very own Tom Brady will host a private VIP Sky Box at Game On! at Fenway, then we will join Tom in Fenway to cheer on Live Football!

There will be a ticket charge for this meetup if you want to join us in Fenway to watch the game live. (If enough people RSVP; Tix will be advanced purchased)

You are welcome to RSVP and join us for the VIP pre-game, and simply stay to watch the game on the VIP Sky Box TV while the ticket holders go into Fenway to pay €5.60 for a Bitter.

When: July 25, 2012 @ 6pm

EVENT: AS Roma (Rome, Italy) vs. Liverpool (England; John Henry's Fenway Sports Group)

Host: Natives member Tom Brady. (Visit his profile HERE)

Why? If you are a fan of Family Guy and have seen the episode titled "Patriot Games" where Tom Brady and the New England Patriots take on the London Silly Nannies, then you might appreciate the humor of this Meetup.

Next Step:

  • RSVP to join us at Game On! (Featuring a private VIP Sky Box and an unlimited cash bar)
  • Those that RSVP will be provided with a special link to purchase a ticket. (If you want to attend the game after the VIP Pre-game tea party - full details will be provided)

Join us to watch the memorable rematch of the 1984 European Cup final!!

Good times.

(Details subject to change)
item.how_to_find_us: We will meet at a reserved VIP Sky Box @ Game On!
item.name: Football at Fenway with host Tom Brady!
